<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Mod Monetization Team"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/mods/{mod-id}/monetization/team"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get users in a monetization team. Successful request will return a [Monetization Team Accounts Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/monetization-team-accounts-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"mod-id","in":"path","description":"Mod id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Monetization Team Accounts Object","properties":{"id":{"description":"Unique id of the user.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1},"name_id":{"description":"Path for the user on mod.io. For example: https://mod.io/u/__name-id-here__","type":"string","example":"xant"},"username":{"description":"Display name of the user.","type":"string","example":"XanT"},"monetization_status":{"description":"The monetization status of the user.","type":"integer","format":"int32"},"monetization_options":{"description":"The monetization options of the user.","type":"integer","format":"int32"},"split":{"description":"User monetization split.","type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"type":"object"}}}},"403":{"description":"You do not have the required permissions.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/docs/response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request.
